publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4126 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to Scottish Swimmers—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish swimmers, Caitlin McClatchey and David Carry, on their stunning gold medal wins on first day of the Commonwealth Games and hopes that these early successes will be an inspiration to others as the games progress. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Murray Tosh*

S2M-4126 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to Scottish Swimmers—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish swimmers, Caitlin McClatchey and David Carry, on their stunning gold medal wins on first day of the Commonwealth Games and hopes that these early successes will be an inspiration to others as the games progress. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Murray Tosh
S2M-4126 Congratulations to Scottish Swimmers (lodged on 16 March 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4126 Congratulations to Scottish Swimmers (lodged on 16 March 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4126 Congratulations to Scottish Swimmers (lodged on 16 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*
